|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI M4 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 2G |revision = V1.0 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTD1395;RTD1395PB; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!--1.6 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;W25Q128JVSQ; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash2size = 8 GiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4A8G165WB-BCRC; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 7C:A7:B0
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2015.07;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.119;Ubuntu 18.04;
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 5 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Type-C
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2, HDMI 2.0b, Audio 3.5mm out, I2C, SPI, UART, GPIO, |addchip = PMIC;Global Mixed Mode Tech;G2237;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, Ultra Low Capacitance ESD Protection Array;Amazing Micro;AZ1143;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = bananapi |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Android 8.1,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2020 |estprice = 43 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08DHHHN3R |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = USB |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8821CU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specification=== *CPU: [[Realtek]] RTD1395 Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A53) *GPU: Mali-470 MP4 *Storage: 16MB SPI Flash, 8GB eMMC 5.1, *Memory: 2GB DDR4 *WiFi & BT: [[Realtek]] RTL8821CU, BT 4.2, USB *Video Outputs: Supports HDMI v2.0b *Audio Outputs: analog via 3.5mm TRSS *Power: 5V/2A via USB Type C or supported PoE Hat *USB 2.0 ports: 4 USB 2.0 host and one USB 2.0 Type-C OTG *GPIO: 40x pins header, compatible with Raspberry Pi B+
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M4 ''Banana Pi BPI-M4'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi#Banana_Pi_BPI-M4 ''Banana Pi BPI-M4''' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/banana-pi-m4-launches-for-38-with-m-2-40-pin-and-poe/ ''Banana Pi M4 launches for $38 with M.2, 40-pin, and PoE'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/05/15/buy-banana-pi-bpi-m4-2gb-ram/ ''Banana Pi BPI-M4 SBC Gets 2GB RAM, Sells for $43'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.hackster.io/news/the-38-banana-pi-bpi-m4-sbc-with-4k-support-and-poe-5b3398d85ca6 ''The $38 Banana Pi BPI-M4 SBC'' on '''Hackster.io''']
